com.github.gorbin.asne.core

Class SocialNetworkManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.github.gorbin.asne.core.SocialNetworkManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class SocialNetworkManager
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    Class for Social Network Manager. Manage social networks.
    Author:
    Anton Krasov, Evgeny Gorbin (gorbin.e.o@gmail.com)

        resultCode - The integer result code returned by the child activity through its setResult().

      • getSocialNetwork

        public SocialNetwork getSocialNetwork(int id)
                               throws SocialNetworkException
        Get social network by id
        Parameters:
        id - social network id( 1 - Twitter, 2 - LinkedIn, 3 - Google Plus, 4 - Facebook, 5 - Vkontakte, 6 - Odnoklassniki, 7 - Instagram)
        Returns:
        SocialNetwork class(FacebookSocialNetwork, TwitterSocialNetwork, LinkedInSocialNetwork, GooglePlusSocialNetwork, InstagramSocialNetwork, VkSocialNetwork, OkSocialNetwork)
        Throws:
        SocialNetworkException
